typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ten_cd as string,
		item_cd as string,
		tei_su as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> csvdata
source(output(
		kg1_cd as string,
		ten_cd as string,
		server_id_bat as string,
		server_id_web as string,
		exec_mode as string,
		exec_date as string,
		create_date as timestamp,
		create_user as string,
		update_date as timestamp,
		update_user as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dbTenpo
csvdata derive(create_user = upper('BWEL2250'),
		create_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> csvdata2
csvdata3 split(between(length(coalesce(ten_cd,'')),1,6),
	disjoint: false) ~> chkTencd@(chkTencdOK, chkTencdNG)
chkTencd@chkTencdOK split(between(length(coalesce(item_cd,'')),1,13),
	disjoint: false) ~> chkItemcd@(chkItemcdOK, chkItemcdNG)
chkItemcd@chkItemcdOK split(isDecimal(tei_su),
	disjoint: false) ~> chkTeisu@(chkTeisuOK, chkTeisuNG)
chkTeisu@chkTeisuOK, dbTenpo exists(chkTeisu@chkTeisuOK@ten_cd == dbTenpo@ten_cd,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> chkExistsTencd
csvdata2 window(over(create_user),
	asc(ten_cd, true),
	asc(item_cd, true),
	line_no = rowNumber()) ~> csvdata3
chkExistsTencd sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ten_cd as string,
		item_cd as string,
		teisuu as decimal(2,0),
		create_date as timestamp,
		create_user as string,
		update_date as timestamp,
		update_user as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ten_cd,
		item_cd,
		teisuu = tei_su,
		create_date,
		create_user,
		update_date = create_date,
		update_user = create_user
	)) ~> sink1
